content: tranquil baby blanket designed by lisa wears a timeless baby blanket that looks classic in white cream and pastels or make it modern in bold bright colours the choice is yours enjoy *this pattern is written using american terms* you will need 300g dk yarn / 8 ply 4mm hook finished size approx 24 wide x 27 long the pattern can be made wider if you choose just make sure you chain multiples of 20 then add 6 to the end the 6 will be for the mesh sides instructions chain 126 row 1 double_crochet in 6th chain from hook * chain 1 skip 1 st double_crochet in nxt st* repeat from * to * to end - turn row 2 chain 4 counts as 1 double_crochet + 1 chain space skip chain space and double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet of previous row * double_crochet in chain space and each double_crochet across * repeat from * to * to last double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in the 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain - turn row 3 chain 4 skip chain space and double_crochet into the 1st double_crochet double_crochet in nxt 8 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in the nxt double_crochet * double_crochet in the nxt 18 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in the nxt st * repeat from * to * 4 more times double_crochet in nxt 8 sts chain 1 double_crochet in the 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain turn row 4 chain 4 skip chain space and double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet double_crochet in nxt 6 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in the nxt double_crochet 3 times * double_crochet in the nxt 14 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in the nxt double_crochet 3 times * repeat from * to * 4 times double_crochet in the nxt 6 sts chain 1 double_crochet in the 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain - turn row 5 chain 4 skip chain space and double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet double_crochet in nxt 4 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in the nxt st 2 times double_crochet in chain space double_crochet in nxt double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 2 times double_crochet in nxt 4 sts * chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt stitch double_crochet in nxt 4 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 2 times double_crochet in chain space double_crochet in nxt double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 2 times double_crochet in nxt 4 sts * repeat from * to * 5 times chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain - turn row 6 chain 4 skip chain space and double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet double_crochet in nxt 6 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 3 times * double_crochet in nxt 14 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 3 times * repeat from * to * 4 times double_crochet in nxt 6 sts chain
